name: MoveOp
overview:
MoveOp develops and markets server migration automation software that automates key processes involved with migrations of data center servers and applications from one operating system (OS) platform to another. MoveOp’s current product, Migration Readiness Master (MRM), helps IT organizations reduce time, cost and complexity of migrations of AIX, Solaris and Linux platforms to blade, rack or virtual servers running Red Hat or SUSE Linux. MRM specifically automates the collection, inventory and analysis of the source-platform server and application information required for successful migrations. MRM’s analysis and reporting helps companies thoroughly understand any risks while identifying the best platform to migrate to.

MoveOp is part of Scalable Software based in Austin, Texas.

acquisition.source_description: Scalable Software Acquires Intellectual Property and Assets of MoveOp, the Linux Migration Division of NEON Enterprise Software
